TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi RegistryProxy extends System.Object

summary.span: 提供了用于操控注册表的属性和方法。

span.span: Provides properties and methods for manipulating the registry.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要使用这些属性，你必须具有读取和写入权限从枚举。To use these properties, you must have Read and Write permission from the enumeration. 以完全信任运行的任何代码 （在下的默认安全策略，这是安装在用户的本地硬盘上的任何代码） 具有足够的权限来访问注册表。Any code running with full trust (under the default security policy, this is any code installed on the user's local hard drive) has the necessary permissions to access the registry. 有关更多信息，请参见 类。For more information, see the class. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.Registry`对象。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表中读取数据Read data from the registry|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例将读取值`Name`从`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp`并将其显示在消息框中。This example reads the value `Name` from `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp` and displays it in a message box. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#8)]

span.span: Returns a type which provides access to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT` 主要用于在 Windows 中存储有关文件关联的信息。`HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT` is primarily used to store information about file associations in Windows. 类，该类在命名空间，控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，授予权限时，授予完成工作所需的这些权限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant only those privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|创建、 读取和写入注册表变量的访问。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |创建Create|可以创建注册表变量。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|没有对注册表变量的访问权限。No access to registry variables.| |读取Read|可以读注册表变量。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|可以写注册表变量。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.Registry`对象。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例将获取的子项的名称`ClassesRoot`注册表项并将它们添加到`ListBox1`。This example gets the names of the subkeys for the `ClassesRoot` registry key and adds them to `ListBox1`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#10)] 此示例要求你拥有`ListBox`名为`ListBox1`项目中。This example requires that you have a `ListBox` named `ListBox1` in your project.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG` 主要用于在计算机上存储设备的设置。`HKEY_CURRENT_CONFIG` is primarily used to store settings for devices on the computer. 类，该类在命名空间，控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，授予权限时，授予完成工作所需的这些权限。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant only those privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|创建、 读取和写入注册表变量的访问。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |创建Create|可以创建注册表变量。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|没有对注册表变量的访问权限。No access to registry variables.| |读取Read|可以读注册表变量。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|可以写注册表变量。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.Registry`对象。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例将创建子项`MyDeviceSettings`。This example creates the subkey `MyDeviceSettings`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#5)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_CURRENT_USER` 主要用于在 Windows 中存储每个用户设置，如颜色和字体。`HKEY_CURRENT_USER` is primarily used to store per-user settings, such as colors and fonts, in Windows. 根据用户与不同的密钥。The key differ according to the user. 类，该类在命名空间，控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，授予权限时，授予完成工作所需的最少特权。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|创建、 读取和写入注册表变量的访问。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |创建Create|可以创建注册表变量。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|没有对注册表变量的访问权限。No access to registry variables.| |读取Read|可以读注册表变量。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|可以写注册表变量。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.Registry`对象。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例将删除子项`Software\MyCompany\Preferences\UserData`。This example deletes the subkey `Software\MyCompany\Preferences\UserData`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#2)]

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The DynData registry key works only on Win9x, which is not supported by this version of the .NET Framework. Use the PerformanceData registry key instead. This property will be removed from a future version of the framework.")

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_DYNDATA` 可用于存储动态注册表数据，例如虚拟设备驱动程序使用的并支持仅在 Windows 95/98 系统上。`HKEY_DYNDATA` is used to store dynamic registry data, such as that used by Virtual Device Drivers and is supported only on Windows 95/98 systems. 在 Windows 95/98 系统上调用任何方法所返回键的`Registry.DynData`，如`CreateSubKey`， `DeleteSubKey`， `GetSubKeyCount`，`GetValueCount`等，将引发。On non-Windows 95/98 systems, calling any methods of the key returned by `Registry.DynData`, such as `CreateSubKey`, `DeleteSubKey`, `GetSubKeyCount`, `GetValueCount`, etc., will throw a . 类，该类在命名空间，控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，授予权限时，授予完成工作所需的最少特权。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|创建、 读取和写入注册表变量的访问。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |创建Create|可以创建注册表变量。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|没有对注册表变量的访问权限。No access to registry variables.| |读取Read|可以读注册表变量。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|可以写注册表变量。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.Registry`对象。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例将删除子项树`Software\MyCompany\Preferences`。This example deletes the subkey tree `Software\MyCompany\Preferences`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public object GetValue (string keyName, string valueName, object defaultValue);
.method public instance object GetValue(string keyName, string valueName, object defaultValue) cil managed
Public Function GetValue (keyName As String, valueName As String, defaultValue As Object) As Object
public: System::Object ^ GetValue(System::String ^ keyName, System::String ^ valueName, System::Object ^ defaultValue);

span.span: Key from which the value is to be retrieved.
Required.
Value to be retrieved.
Required.

param.name: defaultValue
param.span: 当值不存在时要提供的默认值。

span.span: Default value to be supplied if the value does not exist.
Required.
Gets a value from a registry key.
Gets a value from a registry key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `valueName` 不区分大小写。`valueName` is not case-sensitive. 注册表项可以包含一个值，与任何名称都不关联。A registry key can contain one value that is not associated with any name. 在注册表编辑器中显示了此未命名的值，而不是名称将显示字符串"（默认值）"。When this unnamed value is displayed in the registry editor, the string "(Default)" appears instead of a name. 若要检索此未命名的值，指定 null 或空字符串 ("") 为`valueName`。To retrieve this unnamed value, specify either null or the empty string ("") for `valueName`. 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`GetValue`方法。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `GetValue` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |从注册表项读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例将读取值`Name`从`HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp`和将其显示在`MessageBox`。This example reads the value `Name` from `HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\MyApp` and displays it in a `MessageBox`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#9](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#9)]

exception.span: 该用户没有读取注册表项所需的权限。

span.span: The user does not have the permissions required to read from the registry key.

exception.span: 包含指定值的 已标记为删除。

span.span: The that contains the specified value has been marked for deletion.

exception.span: 未以有效注册表根开头。

span.span: does not begin with a valid registry root.
to read from the registry.

permission.span: 若要读取的类型 REG_EXPAND_SZ 注册表项。

span.span: to read a registry key of type REG_EXPAND_SZ.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE` 通常用于存储不发生在用户和用户更改 Windows 中的设置。`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE` is usually used to store settings that do not vary from user to user in Windows. 计算机的所有用户都共享此密钥。All users of the computer share this key. 其五个子项 (`Hardware`， `SAM`， `Security`， `Software`，和`System`) 保存为本地计算机的配置数据。Its five subkeys (`Hardware`, `SAM`, `Security`, `Software`, and `System`) hold configuration data for the local machine. 类，该类在命名空间，控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，授予权限时，授予完成工作所需的最少特权。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|创建、 读取和写入注册表变量的访问。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |创建Create|可以创建注册表变量。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|没有对注册表变量的访问权限。No access to registry variables.| |读取Read|可以读注册表变量。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|可以写注册表变量。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.Registry`对象。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例打开子项`Software\MyCompany\Preferences`和设置的值`FontColor`到`"red"`。This example opens the subkey `Software\MyCompany\Preferences` and sets the value `FontColor` to `"red"`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` 用于访问软件组件的性能信息。`HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` is used to access performance information for software components. 当它已安装并且将计数器数据，并在执行时，每个软件组件创建其对象和计数器的密钥。Each software component creates keys for its objects and counters when it is installed and writes counter data while it is executing. 此数据不存储在注册表中，尽管注册表用来访问它。This data is not stored in the registry, although the registry is used to access it. 相反，调用通过注册表函数`HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA`会导致系统从相应的系统对象管理器收集的数据。Instead, calling registry functions via `HKEY_PERFORMANCE_DATA` causes the system to collect the data from the appropriate system object managers. 在 Windows 98 系统; 上没有此项尝试使用之外调用`Name`方法会引发。This key does not exist on Windows 98 systems; an attempt to use it other than calling the `Name` method will throw an . 此密钥通常无法写入到;尝试在其上创建一个子项将引发。This key cannot normally be written to; attempting to create a subkey on it will throw an . 类，该类在命名空间，控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，授予权限时，授予完成工作所需的最少特权。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|创建、 读取和写入注册表变量的访问。Create, read, and write access to registry variables.| |创建Create|可以创建注册表变量。Create access to registry variables.| |NoAccessNoAccess|没有对注册表变量的访问权限。No access to registry variables.| |读取Read|可以读注册表变量。Read access to registry variables.| |WriteWrite|可以写注册表变量。Write access to registry variables.| 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.Registry`对象。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例将获取值`ThisSoftware`从`MyCompany`子项。This example gets the value `ThisSoftware` from the `MyCompany` subkey. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#7](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#7)]

span.span: Writes a value to a registry key.

MemberSignature.Value: public void SetValue (string keyName, string valueName, object value);
.method public instance void SetValue(string keyName, string valueName, object value) cil managed
Public Sub SetValue (keyName As String, valueName As String, value As Object)
public: void SetValue(System::String ^ keyName, System::String ^ valueName, System::Object ^ value);

span.span: Name of the key to be written to.
Required.
Name of the value to be written.
Required.
Value to be written.
Required.
Writes a value to a registry key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果指定的键或值不存在，则创建它。If the specified key or value does not exist, it is created. 下面是一个示例的任务涉及`My.Computer.Registry.SetValue`方法。Here is an example of a task involving the `My.Computer.Registry.SetValue` method. |到To|查看See| |--------|---------| |在注册表项中设置一个值Set a value in a registry key|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| ## Examples 此示例将值设置`FontColor`为"red"键中`HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`。This example sets the value `FontColor` to "red" in the key `HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\Software\MyCompany\Preferences`. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `HKEY_USERS` 主要用于存储首次用户的默认设置。`HKEY_USERS` is primarily used to store default settings for first-time users. 类，该类在命名空间，控制对注册表变量的访问。The class, which is in the namespace, controls access to registry variables. 不应将注册表变量存储在某些内存位置，在这些位置，不具有 的代码可访问这些变量。Registry variables should not be stored in memory locations where code without can access them. 同样，授予权限时，授予完成工作所需的最少特权。Similarly, when granting permissions, grant the fewest privileges necessary to get the job done. 通过 枚举定义注册表权限访问值。Registry permission access values are defined by the enumeration. 下表详细说明了其成员。The following table details its members. |“值”Value|对注册表变量的访问Access to Registry Variables| |-----------|----------------------------------| |AllAccessAllAccess|创建、读取和写入Create, read, and write| |创建Create|创建Create| |NoAccessNoAccess|无访问权限。No access.| |读取Read|读取Read| |WriteWrite|WriteWrite| 下表列出了所涉及的任务的示例`My.Computer.Registry`对象。The following table lists examples of tasks involving the `My.Computer.Registry` object. |**若要****To**|**请参阅****See**| |------------|-------------| |创建注册表项并设置其值Create a registry key and set its value|[如何：创建注册表项并设置其值How to: Create a Registry Key and Set Its Value](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-create-a-registry-key-and-set-its-value.md)| |删除注册表项Delete a registry key|[如何：删除注册表项How to: Delete a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-delete-a-registry-key.md)| |从注册表项读取值Read a value from a registry key|[如何：从注册表项读取值How to: Read a Value from a Registry Key](~/docs/visual-basic/developing-apps/programming/computer-resources/how-to-read-a-value-from-a-registry-key.md)| ## Examples 此示例对计数，并显示注册表项中的值的数目。This example counts and displays the number of values in the registry key. [!code-vb[VbVbalrMyRegistry#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_VBCSharp/VbVbalrMyRegistry/VB/Class1.vb#4)]
